website_summaries.verdict: This 1.25 liter wet grinder is good for making dosas and idlis for a small family, but if you need to feed more than 6, consider a larger model.
pros: Ideal to grind flour for Idli, Dosa, Urad, Vada, Dhokla, and more
Grinds at a lower temperature for better flavor
cons: Residue may come off the grinding stones at first, so consider an initial grind of rice or other hard ingredient to rub it off

customer_reviews.title: Grinder not durable and jat started leaking in less than 6 months...
customer_reviews.text: The vendor/company doesn't provide any kind of warranty or service support, Please don't buy this product.I had the wet grinder jar leaking in less than 6 months use and Company customer service asks me to fix by myself or contact seller and seller says contact Company,it is a big scam of usless warranty for 200$ product.
customer_reviews.author: SURI

customer_reviews.title: Zero post purchase service. Will never buy or recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: ALERT: The vendor doesn't provide any kind of warranty or service support. Changing my review of this product based on their customer service. I had purchased their Ultra Dura+ table top 1.25L wet grinder and around 6 months it stopped working. I tried contacting them many number of times. They responded only once that too asking for more details. Very disappointed on post purchase experience. At the lease they should be decent to let me know that they cannot service my request...but absolute silence from their part. After spending $200+ it sucks to see it all go the drain. If you still decide to buy, please purchase additional warranty provided by Amazon for some extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: JKL

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4months of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 4months of purchase. I used it to grind batter once a week for idli and dosa. It started giving burnt smell and stopped working. Called up Gandhi appliances as the product is in warranty. They told me to purchase the poly belt for $25 and it's not covered by warranty. I can't get it serviced in California. Didn't expect the belt to wear out in 4months when my colleagues have been using ultra bought from India for ages now. It's basically I wasted $217 for the faulty product and warranty doesn't support all items of the product.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Product does not match the description in Amazon (No - Digital controller, timer, coconut scrapper)
customer_reviews.text: I saw the video about the product and it was talking about the digital control, timer and everything as a feature. but the product does not have any of those features. it was a bit disappointing. in addition to that, it doesn't have the coconut scraper. I don't mind that since I will not use that. I like the product though. disappointed because of the over expectation by seeing the product video.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The product got delivered with a cracked lid and a ...
customer_reviews.text: The product got delivered with a cracked lid and a little damage. Also, the locking system keeps automatically popping open initially when we start the machine, I had to hold it in place for a while to make it run without opening up. I have thrown the box away before testing it, else would have returned it for a new piece.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Bollina

customer_reviews.title: Broke down quickly
customer_reviews.text: The motor stopped working within 5 weeks and we only used it once a week. Really disappointed that it broke down after just 5 uses. We will be returning it soon.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Value for money product
customer_reviews.text: Dont think twice if you want to prepare idly and dosa batter at home. This is an excellent product which grinds the rice perfectly for a great idly and dosa experience
customer_reviews.author: Bunty Parekh

customer_reviews.title: Too Small..Pricey for the size
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even think about it for family. It can only grind for 1 or 2 persons. The pictures are misleading. I think the price is too high for this size. It is not worth more than $80. I wouldn’t recommend this for family with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sukumar Bezawada

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases. We love South Indian food and wanted to make batter at home. Ninja was doing a decent job until one day it gave up. After using this I realized what was I missing- the batter is so smooth and the food is really tasty. The product itself is stable, the grinder does a good job, the stones and container is easy to clean. Good investment !
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShoppingalways

customer_reviews.title: Best grinder, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been two years of use! I love this grinder to grind dosa and idly batter. Easy to install and use. The stone is not heavy. I pretty much grind every week and still runs perfectly fine! Cleaning the stone is bit hard otherwise great product! Overall happy with my purchase from our wedding registry :)
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grinding every single time....
customer_reviews.text: Its a must have for Indian Kitchen...I have had this grinder for a year now and its going strong....I use it once a week and its awesome grinding every single time....
customer_reviews.author: Nivedita

customer_reviews.title: Best wet grinder
customer_reviews.text: We have used ULTRA for almost 12 plus years. Nothing but performance is the definition of this brand. Perfect delivery by Amazon. Intact packing by seller.
customer_reviews.author: sriabi

customer_reviews.title: It works as the advertisement claims
customer_reviews.text: I put five stars on every aspect regarding the respective usage. It is my first day and first time of using the Ultra Dura web grinder. I will keep the review updated if I have any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhong

customer_reviews.title: It's extremely hard to remove the drum once it's placed on motor base.
customer_reviews.text: Now I am editing my review and giving one star, it's been 5 months since I bought from Amazon.com. It's extremely hard to remove the drum once it's placed on motor base. Very hard to handle with stuffs in the drum. I am not sure, if Amazon will replace it under Manufacturer warranty
customer_reviews.author: gsvn73

customer_reviews.title: My old Shantha grinder was a work hose and the batter was cool after grinding
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed. Grinds soaked rice and lentils as expected. The batter does become hot. My old Shantha grinder was a work hose and the batter was cool after grinding. It is an unfair comparison because that was a much larger grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Mylapore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, compact and grinds well
customer_reviews.text: Grinds well. Usually use for making dosa batter. Easy to use and clean. Not too heavy. Sturdy. The plug works well with US system. Very handy and enjoy using it. Got delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Neat
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good to make idli/dosa batter. I hope all indian families should go with this product to prepare homemade batter. But I feel its bit tough to remove the vessel from the grinder as its quite hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Black stone particles into idli dough
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this, returned back. I also bought an extended warranty but no use. Seems like I lost money on that. The problem with this item was about the black color I was getting while making idli dough. The black stone breaks into small particles and makes whole idli black. The good thing is they returned the product. Thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Product performance is very poor. Just did job 2 times. Now it’s stop working. Didn’t grind as we expect.We are not satisfied with this. Trying to return
customer_reviews.author: shakeel ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly good!
customer_reviews.text: It's incredibly good. It grinds the rice well and knead the atta as we do it by hand. Instead buying other brand which is cheaper, Could buy this and use for long. Worth for money!
customer_reviews.author: Anandakumar Nagaraj

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I usually face difficulty in puffing up ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I usually face difficulty in puffing up dhal using mixie and I had to use 3:1 ratio of rice and dhal. In this grinder I used 4:1 and ended up having more dhal in batter. Ground some more rice to equate the ratio. But the most important thing is watching it very close while grinding dhal.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Running Like champ....
customer_reviews.text: This is excellant top wet grinder,no issues for years, often i will chip the stone using small chisel to grinder faster and better,this is the grinder if you want to buy....great for preparing idli , dosa mix...
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Stones are not good
customer_reviews.text: we are using it from 1 month, and the stones are still releasing some black soil, hence the grinded items are bitter and throwing out. will try for couple times, if it is the same, then will return it. some people said 1 or 2 times it will be like that and then will be normal. but we have tried 4 to 5 times, still it is bitter product comes out from the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Hanumantha Rao

customer_reviews.title: works great. I use 1 cups urad dal ad 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Been more than two years. works great. I use 1 cups urad dal ad 5 cups rice soaked and guided separately, once a week.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Bad service
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product on June 2018, it is not working and I do not recommend to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: udhaya

customer_reviews.title: A must for an Indian Kitchen in an American home.
customer_reviews.text: A great product from India. A perfect answer for fast moving world which still wants to retain traditional kitchen ware.
customer_reviews.author: Vasu

customer_reviews.title: Tooooo expensive for the size and work it does!!
customer_reviews.text: This is over priced in the US. Its half the price in India, these grinders are Indian cuisine based.
customer_reviews.author: Jay J

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Ultra has been favorite for our family since years, this product is durable and excellent quality.. I bought this product in India and now amazon is offering almost the same price. The Dosa’s look perfect when grinned in Ultra. I recommend this product to all friends and family who love to eat perfect South Indian breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: I love the table top wet grinder
customer_reviews.text: I love the table top wet grinder. It fits perfectly on my counter top and grinds great. My only suggestion would be, if the seller could give an option for the addition attachment ( aata kneader or coconut scraper) it would be great. I already have Kitchen Aid that I use to knead flour, so don't have use for the one provided by ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Neetu

customer_reviews.title: Make Pistachio Butter!!
customer_reviews.text: We made the best pistachio butter with this kitchen appliance. Suuuuper easy to use, and it churned out enough “product” for us to give mason jars to all of our neighbors for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this one .it's so easy to use and clean . Definitely recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Must for anyone making idly/dosa batter
customer_reviews.text: Making idly/dosa batter is very easy after this. Solid construction, works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Hate this!
customer_reviews.text: I totally hate this, I used to make my idly batter in ninja pro it used to come so soft, when I changed to this grinder the same ratio is coming like stones, I tried many different ratios nothing worked, wada batter is ok, and this is grinding unevenly inspite of scrapping off the edges
customer_reviews.author: Saravanan Ramamoorthy

customer_reviews.title: A stone grinder comes with payment in 5 easy instalments
customer_reviews.text: My batter is ground just right without it heating up. Thanks for making this available at easy payment terms.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt grind well after 8 months usage

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it is heavy and difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jeetu

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the grinder
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is very nice.very easy to clean as the Drum weighs as much as a vessel.only think I dont like is taking the batter from the conical weights.they keep moving which makes cleaning and removing the batter difficult.atta kneader is simply superb makes atta dough in just a minute though u need to slowly add water orelse would endup in sticky dough.overall experience is very satisfactory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drum is difficult to pull out from coupler
customer_reviews.text: The steel drum is so difficult to pull out from the coupler. From day 1 it is like that. I thought it will become loose as i use it, but it has gone even tight after 2 months and now i am unable to take it out. This seems to be a very bad design, didn't see this problem with the ultra that i owned in India.
customer_reviews.author: Manivannan M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grinder
customer_reviews.text: My mom has the big ultra grinder for about 20 years now. That is the reason I chose to purchase this grinder for myself. The small one is perfect for me and my family. It is very easy to use and makes perfect batter for idli and dosai! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Praveena Padmanabhan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your money, never recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t grind properly, lid keeps popping up. Never got full soft consistency for the batter. There are still grains in the batter no matter how long you grind it. Waste of my money. I am still using my mixer grinder to make batter which works way better than this product. Never recommended this
customer_reviews.author: Arvin parvathaneni

customer_reviews.title: Good!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s works well but it doesn’t ground the rice really fine. It’s more on the coarse side.
customer_reviews.author: Aditi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Cover is delicate and should be handled ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a new piece. Well packaged. Package came in stinky box that I had to throw it out immediately. Used the machine. LOVE IT! Cover is delicate and should be handled with care.
customer_reviews.author: Chitra Ramachandran

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying .
customer_reviews.text: So far so good after a year use. It's really difficult to clean as there is so many noock and corners that's are difficult to clean. Not noisy and grinds things fast. It gives the taste and smell which was missing when grind on mixers.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Shelltop Cover
customer_reviews.text: The purple shelltop cover came broken. This leads to spillage and the grinder cannot be used. Request a replacement cover to be shipped ASAP

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: A demo video would have be really helpful for many.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grinder

customer_reviews.title: Liked it .. Awesome customer service of elgi ultra

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell on first use itself

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions inadequate. Except for the kneader attachment, supplied parts are actually spare parts if the original breaks. Don't know what the black circular ring is for though.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this wet grinder
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this wet grinder. I'm able to grind rice and lentils to a smooth paste to make idlis and dosas.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wet grinder

If you need to clean easily then go for the small one. If I am right this was the brand that introduced table top wet grinders.My policy always get it from the leader.

customer_reviews.title: I thought the nice even and fine grinding of the rice and grain ...

I have seen some comments made by people that have tried using it other than its intended use, which were remarked to be not good, I have not tried to utilize it in this way so I can't comment to how well it works for these uses, but I can say that it preforms wonderfully for its intended use. The machine seems to be well built to give it long life. I have used it several times now and it has not disappointed me yet.

I cleaned the parts time and time again but it kept detatching. To add to it all, from the first day, the machine started smoking up from the first use. All in all, it felt like I took my money, threw it in the garbage, and got a huge disappointment in return.

product_meta.title: Ultra Dura+ Table Top 1.25L Wet Grinder with Atta Kneader, 110-volt
product_meta.description: Size:1.25LThe Ultra Dura+ can change the way you use a grinder. Designed for efficiency and exemplary performance. Take a look at the 1.25 liter's model. Sleek, Compact and Space-saving. Light in weight, portable and aesthetically designed. It is fitted with sturdy and durable motor. Patented Conical grinding stones - which results in better batter and less wear and tear of the stone. Made of food grade plastic, SS304 stainless steel drum and rust proof materials.
